parameter.name: headerPresent
parameter.description: Is there a header in the CSV payload ? Default is Absent

parameter.name: valueSeparator
parameter.description: Specify a value separator for CSV. Default is comma ( , )

parameter.name: skipHeader
parameter.description: Should the header row be skipped from the content ? Default if false

parameter.name: columnsToSkip
parameter.description: Comma separated string of column indexes to skip. Leave blank to skip no columns

parameter.name: dataRowsToSkip
parameter.description: Number of data rows to skip. Default is 0

parameter.name: tagNames
parameter.description: Custom tag names to result tags. Use comma separated strings

parameter.name: rootElementTag
parameter.description: Tag name of the root XML element

parameter.name: rootElementNamespace
parameter.description: Namespace URI for root XML element

parameter.name: rootElementNamespaceURI
parameter.description: Namespace prefix for root XML element

parameter.name: groupElementTag
parameter.description: Name of the group xml elements

parameter.name: groupElementNamespace
parameter.description: Namespace URI for group XML element

parameter.name: groupElementNamespaceURI
parameter.description: Namespace prefix group root XML element
